org.middleheaven.io.repository.watch
Interface WatchService

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileIOWatchService, VirtualFileWatchService
public interface WatchService
extends java.io.Closeable

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close the service.
 WatchEventChannel watch(Watchable watchable, WatchEvent.Kind... events)
          Register a ManagedFile to be watched for changes of a given set of kinds, inside a given Watchable.
 

Method Detail

watch

WatchEventChannel watch(Watchable watchable,
                        WatchEvent.Kind... events)
Register a ManagedFile to be watched for changes of a given set of kinds, inside a given Watchable.

Parameters:
watchable - the file repository object to watch
events - kind of events to watch for.
Returns:
a WatchEventChannel for receiving the events.

close

void close()
Close the service. This stops all registered channels and internal monitors.

Specified by:
close in interface java.io.Closeable
